Options.UserSettings: <Envelope> <CategoryList> <Category> <Name>Band Selection</Name> <GroupList> <Group> <Name>2G</Name> <Constraints> <MinSelected>2</MinSelected> <MaxSelected>4</MaxSelected> <Name>NVM Mismatch</Name> <Constraints> <MinSelected>1</MinSelected> <MaxSelected>1</MaxSelected> <ItemType>bool</ItemType> </Constraints> <Destination> <Path>Common:InvalidateNVM:Action</Path> <ValueMapDefault>2</ValueMapDefault> <ValueMap> <Map> <Value>1</Value> <ItemList> <Item> <ID>Ignore</ID> </Item> </ItemList> </Map> <Map> <Value>2</Value> <ItemList> <Item> <ID>Abort</ID> </Item> </ItemList> </Map> <Map> <Value>3</Value> <ItemList> <Item> <ID>Invalidate</ID> </Item> </ItemList> </Map> <Map> <Value>4</Value> <ItemList> <Item> <ID>InvalidateAlways</ID> </Item> </ItemList> </Map> </ValueMap> </Destination> <ItemList> <Item> <ID>Ignore</ID> <Label>Ignore</Label> <Description>Ignore NVM mismatch</Description> <Selected>0</Selected> </Item> <Item> <ID>Abort</ID> <Label>Abort</Label> <Description>Abort on NVM mismatch</Description> <Selected>1</Selected> </Item> <Item> <ID>Invalidate</ID> <Label>Invalidate</Label> <Description>Invalidate on NVM mismatch</Description> <Selected>0</Selected> </Item> <Item> <ID>InvalidateAlways</ID> <Label>Invalidate Always</Label> <Description>Always invalidate NVM</Description> <Selected>0</Selected> </Item> </ItemList> </Group> <Group> <Name>Mode after calibration</Name> <Constraints> <MinSelected>0</MinSelected> <MaxSelected>1</MaxSelected> <ItemType>bool</ItemType> </Constraints> <Destination> <Path>Common:DontSetNormal</Path> </Destination> <ItemList> <Item> <Label>Keep DUT in test mode after calibration</Label> <Value>1</Value> <Description>Keep DUT in test mode after calibration</Description> <Selected>0</Selected> </Item> </ItemList> </Group> <Group> <Name>Instrument</Name> <Constraints> <MinSelected>0</MinSelected> <MaxSelected>1</MaxSelected> <Description>Performs instrument reset on initialize stage.</Description> <Selected>0</Selected> </Item> </ItemList> </Group> </GroupList> </Category> </CategoryList> </Envelope>
